titleStmt.title: Grant Green, Receipt to O. G. Moore and L. J. Proctor
CWG8642

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons, Remissions, and Respites, 1862-1863

body.p:
State of Kentucky, Auditor's Office
Frankfort, Jany 30th, 1863

Received, The Receipt of the Treasurer of the State of Kentucky of this date, to O. G. Moore by L. J. Procter for Fifty Dollars 40 Cents, in full ^except damages^ of the Revenue Tax due from the Sheriff of Edmonson County, for the year eighteen hundred and fifty nine.

$50.40
Grant Green Audr
By C. Bailey, asst

Franklin Cir Ct
Sheriff
$64.79 } Damages
Remiss issued
Feby 2. 1863
